channel.title: Any news on linux support
channel.description:
Is there any news on linux support for Black Mesa Source. I went back to ubuntumate 15.04 but I miss playing Black Mesa on it and I hate to use wine because of the degraded performance.
P.S.
You guys are doing a great job keep up the good work.

item.title: Any news on linux support
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
It’s being worked on, there’s no ETA.

Read full topic
